document_data.name: ''The One Hundred Lives of Ket the Keen''
document_data.mainbody: '''''The One Hundred Lives of Ket the Keen''''' was a ballad about the many near-death escapes of a [[Cormyr]]ean [[halfling]] [[warrior]] [[Ket Stillpond]].
document_data.Description: This ballad was popular among [[bard]]s and a simple but long-winded tune. Ket the Keen, also known as Ket Stillpond had an uncanny luck for avoiding certain death with nothing but the help of his wits and two [[enchanted]] arms, ''[[Reliance]]'' and ''[[Bloodfarmer]]''.
